id: Will the package bombs scare temper the intensifying political flames?
paragraph: Former FBI Asst. Dir. Frank Figliuzzi, former U.S. Attorney Chuck Rosenberg, the Root’s Jason Johnson, Daily Beast’s Sam Stein, WaPo’s Ashley Parker, and LA Times’ Eli Stokols on Trump’s rhetoric, the current political climate & the packages mailed to prominent figures who’ve been critical of TrumpOct. 24, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
